comment: Dr. Paris' assignments are clearly defined and geared towards student success. She is available and responds promptly to questions. She grades and gives feedback in a timely manner.

High expectations for written work AND provides frequent and helpful feedback. She actually reads what you turn in!!    No "automatic check mark" from Dr. Paris.   You can depend on her to grade your papers and provide lots of comments in the margins.
Wonderful teacher; she helped me become a better teacher.
Dr. Paris makes an otherwise boring subject interesting!  She was understanding and interesting.  I loved her class!
SUPER understanding teacher who can really still relate to classroom teaching!  Never a dull moment in her class--VERY useful!  :)
